authors: Radek G. (Based on Achtung Cthulhu character sheet by Rob heath)
instructions: # Shadows Of Esteren Character Sheet.## Very rudementary but with some basic automation## Set Player's Health Condition like it would be a NPC with X(G)\Y(O)\Z(B)\V(C) system.## Potential base value is automatically calculated whenever you change Creativity.## Condition Penalty is automatically calculated whenever Player's Health Condition changes or any of G\O\B\V values and is added to rolls.
